title: LF Top and Mid for competitive team, Meme Page Admins.
body:
Hello, my name is Nutella Fella, I am Captain of Meme Page Admins.

I am currently looking for people to trial in both Top and Mid roles.
Requirements:
1. Minimum Gold
2. Decent Communication Etiquette
3.  None/Low Toxicity

PM if interested for either role and wanting to trial for Meme Page Admins.

replies.body:
I am interested in joining the team, I'm currently gold 2 and main top and mid. But can also adc and support.

Thanks,
